Class Board

java.lang.Object
  GameLand.Board
All Implemented Interfaces:
MouseListener, EventListener
public class Board
extends Object
implements MouseListener

Prettypretty grid. Draws UI and holds reference to player list and interfaces with main game methods

1
Author:
